description: Whether you like to cook or you avoid the kitchen like the plague, this course makes it so easy to create delicious and nutritious soups that will help you stay on your diet or cleanse. From healthy food choices to the 6 secrets to flavoring, you will be surprised at how much fun it is to create soups that will have everyone raving. Soup-er easy to make...in under 20 minutes. Come learn why these soups are truly scandalously slimming!
title: Scandalously Slimming Soups
